function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive correlation between nonmetropolitan counties and COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread in nonmetropolitan areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted vaccination and testing in nonmetropolitan areas","Technologies":"Mobile vaccination units, rapid testing kits","People":"Residents of nonmetropolitan counties","Owner":"Local health authorities"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity in testing rate and COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting COVID-19 outcomes based on testing rate","Mitigation":"Standardization of testing protocols and data analysis methods","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, standardized testing guidelines","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations"},{"Description":"Correlation between built environment variables and prevalence of obesity","Impact":"Influences on behavioral and exposure patterns related to chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Urban planning focused on creating walkable, pedestrian-friendly environments","Technologies":"Urban design software, pedestrian traffic analysis tools","People":"Local government, urban planners","Owner":"City planning departments"}]}
